title: One UI 4.1 update rolling out to the Galaxy A52s 5G, Galaxy A71 5G, and Galaxy S20 FE 4G
content:
Samsung’s new Galaxy S22 series phones were the first to run One UI 4.1 out of the box. But over the last few weeks, the company has expanded the new software to several other models, including the Galaxy Z Fold 3, Galaxy Z Flip 3, Galaxy S21 series, Galaxy A52 5G, and more. In the

The post One UI 4.1 update rolling out to the Galaxy A52s 5G, Galaxy A71 5G, and Galaxy S20 FE 4G appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is rolling out the stable One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy A52s 5G, Galaxy A71 5G, and Galaxy S20 FE 4G.Â
